mapper.sql: select a.boseq,a.id,a.content,a.title,a.regdate,a.readhit,a.likes,a.remark,a.image,b.nickname from board a join members b on (a.id = b.id)
mapper.update: update board set readhit = readhit + 1 where boseq = #{boseq}
update board set content=#{content}, title=#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regdate=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') where boseq = #{boseq}
mapper.insert: insert into b_reply(replyseq, boseq, id, rid, likes,content, regdate, groupno, orderno, depth) values(b_rep_seq.nextval, #{boseq}, #{id}, #{rid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},0, #{content}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/MM/dd/HH24:MI:SS'), b_rep_seq.currval, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update b_reply set content = '#{content}', regdate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy/MM/dd/HH24:MI:SS') where replyseq = #{replyseq}
mapper.select: select a.replyseq,a.boseq,a.id,a.likes,a.content,a.regdate,a.groupno,a.depth,a.rid,a.orderno,b.nickname from b_reply a join members b on (a.id = b.id) order by groupno, orderno, depth
